name: Sreenath Bhasi Live Concert at Ignite Super Club, Hsr
about: Get ready, Bangalore! Sreenath Bhasi is set to take the stage at Ignite Superclub on January 11, 2025. Known for his electrifying performances and chart-topping hits, this is a night you won't want to miss. Experience the energy and charm of one of Malayalam music's most dynamic artists as he performs fan favorites like "Jada" and "Illuminati."

address.streetAddress: 26, Haralur Main Rd, near HP Petrol Station, Amblipura, PWD Quarters, Ambalipura, HSR Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560102, India

name: Bollywood Velvet Ft DJ Sonal (Official After Party of Sirocco)
about: Experience the electrifying Bollywood Velvet party featuring DJ Sonal at 2 Moons, 1MG Mall, Bangalore. Dance the night away to a mix of chart-toppers and classics, celebrating the official after-party of Sirocco College Fest. Don't miss this ultimate Bollywood experience on January 11th, 2025, starting at 8:30 pm.

address.streetAddress: 5th floor, 1, MG Mall, Trinity Circle, Mahatma Gandhi Rd, above 1MG Mall, Halasuru, Someshwarpura

name: Avial Live in Concert at Ignite Super Club, Hsr Layout, Bangalore
about: Bengaluru, prepare for an unforgettable night as Avial, the legendary Malayalam alternative rock band, takes over Ignite WL Super Club on Saturday, February 1, 2025. Experience their iconic hits like "Nada Nada" and "Chekele" in a high-energy performance that blends traditional folk with modern rock. Secure your tickets now for a night of raw, authentic music that promises to resonate with fans of all generations.

address.streetAddress: 26, Haralur Main Rd, near HP Petrol Station, Amblipura, PWD Quarters, Ambalipura, HSR Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560102, India

name: SoMAD Select Sundaze Ft. SGAMO 🇮🇹 & Friends at Lumara Bar & Kitchen | MG Road - Bengaluru
about: Join us for SoMAD Select Sundaze, the iconic city day party celebrating its 3rd anniversary at Lumara this Sunday! Enjoy 6 hours of non-stop music with SGAMO 🇮🇹 & Friends, a hand-made D&B audio system, BBQ & grills, art and fashion pop-ups, a makeup glam station, and the best cocktails by the city's finest mixologists. Come party and socialize with a community of 13,000+ like-minded individuals from around the world under one cozy rooftop with a stunning view. Don't miss this impeccable celebration!

address.streetAddress: Trinity Pothraj, #154, 4th floor, Trinity Circle, Old Madras Rd, Gowthamapuram, Jogupalya, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008, India

name: SoMAD Y2K - A Early 2000S Throwback Back Party Ft. Martin Dsouza &Chirag at Daddy Indiranagar Bangalore
about: Transport yourself back to the turn of the millennium at "Y2K Party" at Daddy, the Hottest Daily Bar in Town! Dance to the greatest hits of the late 90s and early 2000s, from *NSYNC to Britney Spears, and relive the nostalgia with a Y2K chic dress code. Capture memories in our Y2K-inspired photo booth and get ready for a night filled with throwback vibes and unforgettable moments.

address.streetAddress: 963, 12th Main Rd, HAL 2nd Stage, Doopanahalli, Indiranagar

name: NOSTALGIA Ft. Almost Human / 11Th Jan / Raahi
about: Get ready for an electrifying night with Nostalgia presents Almost Human live at Raahi this January. Dance to cutting-edge tunes and unforgettable vibes in the heart of the city. Join us on Saturday, 11th January, 8 PM onwards at Raahi, Bengaluru. Event by CentiGrade.

address.streetAddress: 15, State Bank of India Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar

name: THE BOLLYWOOD MAYHEM
about: Get ready to groove to the rhythm of Bollywood beats with Music Mafia at Magique! This talented DJ is known for mixing the hottest tracks from the Indian film industry, ensuring a night filled with classic hits and the latest chart-toppers. Don't miss out on the chance to dance the night away with Music Mafia behind the turntables.

address.streetAddress: Plot 36, 100 Feet Road, Near SJR Junction, Koramangala 6th Block

name: CrossOver Ft. Mia Mendi / 12Th Jan / Kitty Ko
about: Experience the ultimate party vibes at Tonight's CrossOver Edition featuring the sensational MIA MENDI at Kitty Ko on Sunday, 12th January from 7PM onwards. Join us for a night of non-stop music and fun in Bangalore. Secure your spot now as it's a limited capacity event with entry through reservation only.

address.streetAddress: The Lalit Ashok, Kumara Krupa Road, Highgrounds, Seshadripuram

name: AVIAL LIVE in Concert at IGNITE Super Club, HSR Layout, Bangalore
about: Get ready to groove to the iconic hits of Malayalam rock legends AVIAL at IGNITE WL SUPER CLUB in HSR Layout, Bengaluru on Saturday, 18th January 2025. Experience their genre-defying sound and electrifying performance, blending traditional folk elements with edgy rock styles. Don't miss out on this high-energy, unforgettable evening!

address.streetAddress: 26, Haralur Main Rd, near HP Petrol Station, Amblipura, PWD Quarters, Ambalipura, HSR Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560102, India

name: Anima Vol. I -  Ft. Shanka Tribe & Notesic
about: Join us in Bengaluru for ANIMA Vol. I, presented by The Urban Weaver. This immersive sonic journey features the enchanting Shanka Tribe and the electrifying Notesic, blending earthy instruments like the oud and didgeridoo for a unique experience. Celebrate the launch of their new track and EP in a captivating atmosphere that promises deep connection and artistic discovery.

address.streetAddress: 1st floor of Gillys redefined,# 413, 100 Feet Road,, 4th Block, Koramangala, KHB Block Koramangala, Koramangala 4-B Block, 5th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560034, India

name: Total Decimation Ft Sinister (Death Metal/Netherlands)
about: Get ready for the return of TOTAL DECIMATION, as Extreme Underground India presents its 2nd edition on January 18th, 2025, in Bangalore. Experience an unforgettable night of extreme metal featuring legendary acts like SINISTER, making their Indian debut, alongside Sri Lanka's DHISHTI, progressive innovators ECCENTRIC PENDULUM, cosmic conjurers MOTHRA, and the fierce AGHARATH. Prepare for an auditory onslaught that will leave you in awe.

address.streetAddress: 1st floor of Gillys redefined,# 413, 100 Feet Road,, 4th Block, Koramangala, KHB Block Koramangala, Koramangala 4-B Block, 5th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560034, India

name: Lollapalooza India 2025
about: Get ready, Mumbai! Lollapalooza India is back for its third edition on March 8-9, 2025. Featuring over 30 iconic artists across various genres like pop, rock, indie, hip-hop, and more, including headliners such as Green Day, Shawn Mendes, and Zedd. Join the ultimate music festival experience with amazing performances, food, beverages, and brand activations. Don't miss out on this two-day extravaganza celebrating live music and culture!
